summary.span: Represents a collection of objects that are selected in a .

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are selected in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的列的顺序不能保证选择它们的顺序相匹配。The order of columns in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected. 不执行高效地使用大量的列时。The does not perform efficiently when working with large numbers of columns. 通常情况下，控件将不包含足够多的列此项为出现问题，但如果你正在使用大量的列，则可以使用以确定是否选择了整个网格，或者你可以使用来确定所选的列 （或指定状态的列数） 数。Typically, controls will not contain enough columns for this to be an issue, but if you are working with large numbers of columns, you can use the to determine if the entire grid is selected, or you can use the to determine the number of selected columns (or the number of columns in a specified state). 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
